title: When Sam Set Sail
description: This engaging tale of adventure and camaraderie welcomes the reader aboard an unexpected journey with unforeseen events. For children of all ages who enjoy the sea, from the deck or the shore, this adventure begs to be read again and again. Illustrate the events in this journal as you would record the voyage. Share with family and friends and see what they think of the surprise ending!
author: LeAnn Beck
